content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received two more messages from my computer that the command 'None' returned the same error. However, when I tried the 'list_files' command with the argument 'directory' set to '/', the computer returned a list of files in that directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "mkdir -p Atlas/code_files Atlas/text_files Atlas/misc_files && mv *.py Atlas/code_files/ && mv *.txt Atlas/text_files/ && mv * Atlas/misc_files/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"mv: cannot move \'Atlas\' to a subdirectory of itself, \'Atlas/misc_files/Atlas\'\\nmv: cannot move \'atlas.settings.yaml\' to \'Atlas/misc_files/atlas.settings.yaml\': Device or resource busy\\nmv: cannot move \'atlas.yaml\' to \'Atlas/misc_files/atlas.yaml\': Device or resource busy\\n"', type='action_result')]
"""
